events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I want to return it.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's description of wanting their money back.
An appropriate customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the returned jacket.
Hello, thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I am here to help you with the refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has already been shipped back to us?
Thank you for your quick response. The order number is 123456789, and I have already sent the jacket back via UPS yesterday.
Once we receive the returned jacket, we will process your refund within 3-5 business days and notify you as soon as it is complete.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the clear instructions and quick assistance with my refund request.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund today. The amount should reflect on your account shortly.
We are following up to ensure that you have received your refund and that you are satisfied with how your request was handled.
Yes, I have received the refund in full, and I am very happy with your efficient support. Thank you very much!
The refund case has now been closed. Please feel free to contact us in the future if you need any further assistance.
